CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, August 30, 1952, pg. 2, reads: "NURSES CAPPED - Graduation and capping services were held for Shadyside Hospital nurses last Friday night at the First Methodist Church. Among the graduates who were capped was Miss Mary Louise Reed of 2549 Chauncey Drive.  She is the first of her race to be so honored at Shadyside Hospital.  With two of her classmates, Miss Lois Morase, left, and Miss Rita Falvo, right, Miss Reed is shown 'capped' after the ceremonies were over. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of three Shadyside Hospital nurses, Lois Ann Morase, Mary Louise Reed, and Rita Falvo, after graduation ceremonies, possibly at First Methodist Church, another version
